STEPHEN AILES
1250 COM-MECTICUT AVENUE, N. W.
WASHINGTON, D. C. 20036
June 21, 19S8
Dear Link:
Thank you for your letter of June 5, which
arrived while I was away.
An incredible number of people here in
Washington, in Princeton and indeed in New York,
told me that they had seen the ’’Help Wanted”
program which impressed me tremendously with the
size and certainly the quality of your audience.
I enjoyed the experience and was greatly
impressed by the conception, organization and
execution of the program.
My best regards to you and to Bill McCarter.
Sincerely yours
Mr. Lincoln M. Furber
Director Public Affairs
WETA Television
2S00 Fourth Street, N. W.
Washington, D. C. 20001
